mod.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a member of a group of young people in Britain in the 1960s who wore a particular type of neat clothes, listened to soul music, and rode motor scooters
mod.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: a member of a group of young people in the UK in the 1960s and 1970s, who followed a fashion for neat clothes, soul music, and parkas (=a long coat with a hood). Mods rode scooters and often went in large groups to seaside towns to have fights with rockers on bank holidays.
mod.translation[3].definitions[0].defini: a Gaelic festival of music and poetry held in Scotland every year
